Summary: 3 intense red-orange lights moving in formation
divs: sighting detailsi was out on my back porch in between new years' eve events - i happened to look up and saw a large faraway spread of three red\orange lights moving in formation in a line, hovering for a bit, then continuing on past my house out of view. i've never seen anything like it and don't see how it could've been jets, planes or helicopters. the next day i was looking around for news of it and didn't find much but a mention in the examiner of a simiar sighting at the same time of two lights. that brought me to mufon where i discovered case 34478 which i'm pretty sure is of the same entities.
trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Washington
There were no other sightings in Washington on or around January 1st 2012
